reviews.review: Ради айдола мне пришлось вернуться в игру спустя 2-3 года пропуска.
веселая и очень интересная особенно в кампании друзей
2000h in game and not even bored, the best game ever! :)

I wish Steam Reviews had a button "Yes, but..."

DBD is a funny and entertaining game where you can play as a killer or survivor as in your favourite horror movies. The thrill is easy to feel in both roles.
The concepts are easy to get, there are a lot of content (skills, hexes) and a good learning curve. Some killers and survivors are harder to master to play. It has some bugs, but the company is really on it all the time. [strike] It has a balanced system that allows players with similar level and skills to play together. [/strike]

BUT..... here comes the bad part....
The company is very greedy in my opinion. Too many DLCs with abusive prices. The base game only comes with 5 killers and survivors and not all of them are included in the DLC packs. I understand they need to win money for themselves and to maintain the game, maybe someone can explain me how it works and maybe change my mind?
If you dare to criticize them on forums they will ban you and/or take away a cosmetic you have. They're very emo-softy-sensitive, I'm not kidding, hilarious.
The community.... mostly toxic, prepare yourself to have a thousand of insults on your profile and harassment. Disconnecting when losing... etc.
But no worries not everybody is like that, there are cool and nice people too =)
Chat censorship is a joke, sometimes u can't even say "hello" to others or "thank you".

Read another reviews, everybody thinks the same. But as long as people pay... who cares about complains? They did a good business, people love and hate it and they are here to make money after all, isn't it?
n o m i t h e r <3
屠夫单边玩家 今天打小丑 人类图腾插旮旯里面拆不掉 欺负胖子是吧 你游戏做的好啊

（このレビューは個人の感想です。）

キラーをやっていましたが、今回のアプデを最後にキラー引退しました。
特に修正の入らなかったドクター使いでしたが、恵み実装により
すべてのキラーがナーフされたのと同じになってしまい、気持ちが萎えました。

４周年以降クソゲーになり果ててしまった。
運営はとにかくキラーをナーフするのが大好き！！！
サバイバーちゃん全員を絶対に脱出させなきゃダメ！！！！！
と、キラーに強いてきます。
キラーやったことない人しかいない運営だから仕方ありません。
別に脱出できなくてもBP貰えるし・・・＾＾；

このゲームをやって分かったことは、中の人の強さ、上手さがキラーに反映されるので
いくらナーフされようが強い人は本当に強い。と言うこと。
（どのゲームでも言えることですけどね）
しかしながらナーフに次ぐナーフをすることで、中の人にダイレクトアタックかまして
キラー人口を減らすことに成功したようです。ﾖｶｯﾀﾈ

ゲーム配信者はこのゲームをやることでかなりの収益が出ますので
こぞってやっていますよね。
新鯖や新キラー、衣装もバンバカ課金してますし
このゲームが衰退することはなさそうですが
運営には痛い目を見てもらいたいと心の底から願っているクソゲーです。
とても好きだったゲームだけに残念ですが、キラー目線で鯖やって
BPを献上したいと思います。以上です。

Welcome to Camp by Daylight aka Killer by Daylight (:

This is oddly a really fun game when you know what you are doing, i always seem to keep coming back to play it. Though there is a few things i dislike about the game. Its easier to play survivor then killer. When playing as survivor you get 3 other team members to help you do the objectives or lose the heat of the killer but when it comes to being a killer you have to deal with all 4 of those survivors which in the beginning is very hard and even after you know what you are doing it still is hard. Another problem i have with the game and everyone else has is the matchmaking, the matchmaking is awful. You could be lev 1 and have one game where people know what they are doing and when it comes to playing another game you will have the most brain dead survivors/killer. Overall this game is pretty fun and i would recommend playing this game especially if you have friends who have it.

ok, ya know what, if you dont mind buggy messes of a game, because Behaviour absolutely refuses to fix their game, this can be fun. Honestly, it was in a perfect place back when freddy was added, granted hit boxes were still bad, it was very very playable. each update since has broken something, not to mention the client is a resource hog for no reason, and again Behaviour does absolutely nothing to address the issue. all in all, shit client, but good game(most of the time)

Lo recomiendo a mis amigos para pasar el rato!

Dead By Daylight was one of my favorite games on the Xbox, and since its only 10 bucks, its a no brainer to pick up right now. There is a bunch of new things that have been added since iv'e last played. I'm excited to unlock new killers, new survivors, learn new maps, and what the game has no offer. The best part is the Halloween event going on that's giving out lots of in game currency for free and free cosmetics. Check it out.
